source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

objectives_summary: Rig props and characters for animation and videogames.

items.title: Learn Arnold - Fundamentals of Shading and Lighting
items.headline: Become an expert in Shading, Lighting and Rendering with Arnold for Maya, Katana, Cinema4d, Houdini and other 3D render
objectives_summary: Fully understand the principles of shading and lighting and how to apply it to your own work.
Have better chances to land a job in the VFX industry by becoming more versatile and efficient.
Be able to create photo-realistic renderings which stand out in the community.

items.title: Blender Character Creation for Games and Animation
items.headline: Learn to use Blender to create your own 3D characters for animation and video games.
objectives_summary: Model a 3D character in Blender
Use Blender's sculpt tools to create folds and creases for clothes
UV Map a 3D character

items.title: 2D Animation in Moho from Basic to Advanced
items.headline: Learn to Apply the Principles of Animation to Create an Organic Walk Cycle for Your Characters
objectives_summary: Create an Organic Walk Cycle Applying Advanced Principles of Animation
Use the Drawing Tools in Moho
Trace Characters in Moho

items.title: Lumion 8 -  Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: Photorealistic 3D Rendering and 3D Animation for Architect and Interior  Designer
objectives_summary: Become a Lumion 8 expert
Learn all commands and know how to use them appropriately

items.title: Introduction to Nuke VFX Compositing: The Essentials - NK101
items.headline: A full Nuke visual effects training course for VFX Compositing in Nuke.  Final project of a Junior Compositor shot!
objectives_summary: Nuke's User Interface
Concepts and techniques for digital compositing
Additive color theory

items.title: Blender Asset Modeling Basics

objectives_summary: Over 2 hours of step-by-step content!
A strong knowledge of the modeling tools in Blender
A strong knowledge of the UV mapping tools in Blender

Draw and sculpt a more accurate presentation of the human body from head to toe
Digitally sculpt the human anatomy ecorche

items.headline: Learn advanced texture creation and particle behaviors by creating your own custom AAA quality particle effects
objectives_summary: Create practical, real world particle effects for use in your games
Learn the techniques for creating your own complex AAA quality effects with leading game development and motion graphics software
Understand how to break down complicated effects into simpler components, allowing you to adapt these techniques to any effect imaginable

items.title: 3D Modeling in Blender 2.9
items.headline: Step by Step 3D Asset Creation
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling using Blender, a free and open source modeling and animation package
Hard surface modeling techniques and how to approach different challenges
Using modifiers for a more efficient and advanced workflow

items.title: Male Character Creation in Zbrush
items.headline: Model male warrior character with proper anatomy, hair, clothing, accessories and weapons in Zbrush.
objectives_summary: Male Anatomy
Hair & Beard
Weapons

items.title: Develop Parametric Architecture with Grasshopper

objectives_summary: Create flexible, parametric models for architectural design exploration
Understand the basic components to steer program flow
Describe a design problem parametrically

items.title: Fusion 360 for 3D Printing - Design Fidget Spinners
items.headline: Learn useful tools and techniques with Fusion 360 while designing 7 fun fidget spinners.  Each designed for 3d printing.
objectives_summary: Efficiently use Fusion 360 to design models that can be 3d printed
Implement user defined parameters to quickly and efficiently modify their designs
Bring McMaster-Carr models into their designs and modify them

items.title: Complete Rigging Course: Moho & Anime Studio
items.headline: Step by step course to help you learn this skill - effortlessly
objectives_summary: Easily learn Anime Studio Pro/ Moho Rigging techniques
Learn all of the tools, menus, tricks and techniques to make the rigging process efficient and fun!
Increase your rigging skills without having to have 'previous experience'
